Body: Just a question out of curiosity. Before typing became commonplace, many writing communications must have been transcribed from dictation. My hypothesis is that certain syntax and grammar must change from dictated to (personally) written communication. Is there any research in this subject?
Title: Does speech transcription change syntax/grammar?

OwnerUser.AboutMe:
I'm a UX|IA|Web Designer and developer. I speak Spanish and English.
